page.title: 06EVENTS
page.content: {Broadwell Village Fete:}The fete held on the second Saturday in June is an important event. It provides a chance for villagers to co-operate, have a good out and to raise money for local organisations. Attractions this year included a BMX bike display, a fancy dress competition, demonstrations by the fire service and a model aero club as well as a popular bottle stall, tombola and raffle. This year Â£900 was raised. {Heythrop Hunt:}The parish of Broadwell is in the middle of the best of the Heythrop Hunt country and hounds always meet once or twice a season in the village. The hunt,which celebrates its 150th anniversary this year, attracts a large following from the surrounding district on horseback, foot or cars.It has some of the best fox-hunting in this part of England.
